host.$comment: May change to sensor_name in the future, or become user configurable: https://redmine.openinfosecfoundation.org/issues/4919

tx_guessed.description: the signature that triggered this alert didn't tie to a transaction, so the transaction (and metadata) logged is a forced estimation and may not be the one you expect

storing.description: the file is set to be stored when completed

version.description: The version of this EVE DNS event

rrname_truncated.description: Set to true if the rrname was too long and truncated by Suricata

storing.description: the file is set to be stored when completed

exception_policy.description: The exception policy(ies) triggered by the flow. Not logged if none was triggered

stream_urgent.description: Number of packets dropped due to TCP urgent flag

ipv4_in_ipv4.description: Number of IP-in-IP packets seen for ipv4-ipv4

ipv4_in_ipv6.description: Number of IP-in-IP packets seen for ipv4-ipv6

ipv6_in_ipv4.description: Number of IP-in-IP packets seen for ipv6-ipv4

ipv6_in_ipv6.description: Number of IP-in-IP packets seen for ipv6-ipv6

trunc_pkt.description: Number of packets truncated by AF_PACKET

error.description: Consolidated stats on how many times app-layer error exception policy was applied, and which one

memcap.description: How many times defrag memcap exception policy was applied, and which one
How many times flow memcap exception policy was applied, and which one

midstream.description: How many times midstream exception policy was applied, and which one

ssn_memcap.description: How many times session memcap exception policy was applied, and which one

reassembly.description: How many times reassembly memcap exception policy was applied, and which one

urg.description: Number of TCP packets with the urgent flag set

urgent_oob_data.description: Number of OOB bytes tracked in TCP urgent handling

tc_urgent_oob_data.description: Number of Out-of-Band bytes sent by server using TCP urgent packets

ts_urgent_oob_data.description: Number of Out-of-Band bytes sent by client using TCP urgent packets

exception_policy.description: How many times app-layer error exception policy was applied, and which one
